content: SP-M/H Electroplated Diamond Wire (Steel) Premium diamond wire for pure steel cutting (15-30 kW wire saw) ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond wires, floor saw blades, and wall saw blades- - - ### FEATURES:Features Premium diamond wire with conical beads for maximum cutting speed Engineered for cutting steel or highly reinforced concrete using medium to high power wire saws Electroplated wire with 48 beads per meter Robust build from highest grade of materials to increase safety and prevent fast wear Made for wet and dry cutting in concrete and wet steel cutting Applications Complex projects and demanding steel cutting applications Cutting steel, heat-treated steel, alloys and highly reinforced concrete ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base material: Steel Segment type: Electroplated Wet or dry operation: Wet and Dry Technical Data | Base material | Steel | Segment type | Electroplated | Wet or dry operation | Wet and Dry | Bead diameter | 0.4 in | Number of beads per meter | 48 | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2309581 - Diamond Wire DS-W 10.8-100 EP SP-M/H ST - Package Size 1 pc
